name: dombo
description: A limited subset of jQuery. Has event handlers (on, off, one, trigger) and className manipulation (hasClass, addClass, removeClass, toggleClass)

scripts.test: wzrd index.js test/dombo-loader.js test/test-suite.js test/dombo.js test/jquery.js
scripts.create-build: browserify index.js -s $ > builds/dombo.${npm_package_version}.js && browserify index.js -s $ | uglifyjs -c > builds/dombo.${npm_package_version}.min.js
scripts.create-release: browserify index.js -s $ > builds/dombo.js && browserify index.js -s $ | uglifyjs -c > builds/dombo.min.js

author: Tobias Baunb√¶k <freeall@gmail.com>
